title: Man City vs Southampton result: Player ratings as Pep Guardiola’s side cruise into quarter-finals
text:
Manchester City remained on course to win a third successive League Cup title after cruising past Southampton 3-1 at the Etihad Stadium.

Ralph Hasenhuttl's side entered the fixture wounded after a harrowing 9-0 defeat to Leicester, but provided stern resistance until Nicolas Otamendi eventually broke the deadlock with a header after 20 minutes.

Sergio Aguero then scored either side of half-time to secure City's place in the quarter-finals, but they weren't entirely free from nerves as Jack Stephens pulled one back with 15 minutes remaining.
